alert.note: Alert for Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 22 at 6:13PM CST until February 23 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CST FOR EAST CENTRAL RANKIN AND CENTRAL SCOTT COUNTIES... At 612 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pelahatchie, or 7 miles west of Morton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Morton and Branch around 625 PM CST. Forkville around 630 PM CST. Harperville and Hillsboro around 645 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
